m_szDocTitle: German car makers are getting hyped about hydrogen | Ars Technica
m_szDocSumamry: German car makers are getting hyped about hydrogen Audi and Mercedes-Benz are the latest to jump on the H2 train. by Jonathan M. Gitlin - Jan 18, 2016 3:08 pm UTC Audi's h-tron quattro fuel cell concept. Audi Audi's h-tron quattro fuel cell concept. The h-tron's insides. Mercedes-Benz This is the Mercedes-Benz GLC. A fuel-cell version is due to go on sale in 2017. Mercedes-Benz Several years ago, Mercedes-Benz leased 50 fuel-cell powered F-Cells to environmentalists and celebrities in California. Toyota The 2016 Toyota Mirai. This is an actual production car you can buy, and we've even tested
